original_title: お役者変化捕物帖 血どくろ屋敷
overview: The second work in the series "Cases of An Actor in Disguise" starring Kokichi Takada, based on the original work of Tatsuro Jinde. Popular ronin actor Kasumi Ippei intervenes in a planned robbery of the mint, where gold coins are minted for the Shogunate.
title: Cases of An Actor in Disguise: Bloodskull Mansion
